## For Loops and Randomization Tests

#### Question 1

```{r}
##################################################################
# Function: Count_Zero
# 
# Input:
# Output: 
# ---------------------------------------------------------------
random_vector <- c(4,0,4,5,6,7,5,7,0,7,0,6)
counter <- rep(NA,length(numeric_vector))
Count_Zero <- function(numeric_vector){
  counter <- rep(NA,length(numeric_vector))
  for(i in seq_along(random_vector)){
    if(numeric_vector[i]==0){
      counter[i]=1
    } else {
      counter[i]=0
    }
    return(sum(counter))
  }
}
Count_Zero(numeric_vector=random_vector)
```
